title: $2,750 3bed/ 2bath house for tent
posting_body: Located at quiet & nice neighborhood of Pittsburg.
It is a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom and double garage single family house.
Washer, dryer, refrigerator & stove are included.
Moving in is $2,750 first month rent plus $2,750 security deposit.
Tenant is responsible for water, electricity & trash.
If interested, please present your credit report and call
Will arrange an open house at 10:30 am this Saturday & Sunday (8/6 & 8/7)
